short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable picture-in-picture (PiP) & browser playback controls for Hulu videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hulu prevents Chrome's picture-in-picture (PiP) feature. This extension re-enables w/ play/pause, forward/backward seek, next episode, and restart episode controls. There is no previous episode button on Hulu. Captions will not display w/in PiP.
